name: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty on a single virtual machine - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys a standalone instance of WebSphere Liberty on a Linux virtual machine. This template can install base, core or nd edition.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Modify the libertynode_was_liberty_edition variable in CAM Variables to change the installation type to base, core or nd.
3. IBM Knowledge Center for WAS Liberty - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEQTP_liberty/as_ditamaps/was900_welcome_liberty.html
4. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
